name: Firefox Iconize Buttons on Bookmarks Toolbar
description:
For Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

This Iconizes Toolbar Buttons on the Bookmarks Toolbar.

Tested on Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

Modified code from Userstyles:

style 15061

style 41232

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
additional_info:
Updated 03-20-2012
Due to Bug 693510 - drop support for prefixes from border-radius* and box-shadow 

Updated 10-07-2011
Fixed toolbar button dropmarkers spacing so the dropmarkers would be a little closer to the toolbar button icons. 

Updated 04-04-2011
Fixed some issues with extensions Stylish 1.1.2b1 and Fire.fm and Adblock Plus.

Updated 03-03-2011
Fixed toolbar button issue where the left click behavior of some toolbar button icons didn't have the same left click behavior as the toolbar button dropmarker, has a result to this update the toolbar buttons dropmarkers only appear when hovered with mouse cursor.

Updated 12-30-2010
Now compatible with [Ext] Firefox 4 UI Fixer: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/258712/
